annotations.description: Today I'm making Slurm, Fry's favorite insect secreted soft drink. It's Highly Addictive! Like everyone on Earth I'm a pretty huge fan of Futurama, so it was...
annotations.title: Slurm From Futurama | How to Drink

textContent:
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Honey Syrup
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Lime Juice
1 oz. -or- 30 ml. Midori
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Light Rum
2 Dashes Bitterman's Elemakule Bitters

Shake & Strain
Top with club soda

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DLRLlXHdMlo
title: Slurm
